page.title: 02An adults day
page.content: Slumber shattered by the alarm at 7am. Walk the dog and collect daily papers for breakfast reading, after which I feed the dog. Now I check and water the plants in the greenhouse, and then I wake the children. Its now 8am and I am at the office to open for the day's business. Check Workshop Lists for the day and order spare parts not in stock. The mail is delivered and opened, accounts paid by clients are processed and banked with cash taken during the morning. 12 noon and lunch. Afternoon is the time to check usage of spare parts and petrol-pump sales. There may be a Taxi Hire and a jaunt out of the office. At 4pm the day's work is over so I go home. An hour in the garden before tea and then some decorating afterwards. 10pm and the dog has a walk before being kennelled. A quick supper and then off to bed.
